articles.title: Scientists have found largest fossil of trapdoor spider in Australia. Take a look! - WION
articles.description: Scientists have found largest fossil of trapdoor spider in Australia. Take a look!
articles.content: Scientists have discovered the fossil of a large trapdoor spider in Australia. This is the fourth giant spider fossil to be found in Australia, but it is not just another fossilised spider. This is t… [+3078 chars]
